name: Enough Already ..
description:
We all have one. This is mine. A tasty strawberry ice cream with a cookie exhale. I'm not a flavor reviewer so I'll do my best.
JF Sweet Strawberry/TPA Strawberry Ripe is my go to when I want a candy and syrupy strawberry base. No real strawberry here.
FA Cookie adds a nice cookie exhale to the vape.
HS French Vanilla Ice Cream/LB Vanilla Ice Cream is a base I use often with fruits like blueberry and raspberry. It just works.
FA Meringue is there as a sweetener and also adds a little extra element to the ice creams.
Feel free to sub TPA VBIC @ 3%. Unfortunately I found out I was a pepper taster after I bought a 4oz bottle(scotch and flavor orders don't go together). 
Enjoy.
edit: French vanilla ice cream HS lowered to 0.25%.
Thanks for the advice mlNikon.
author: heatho72

reviews.text: So this is pretty tasty, its a little heavier than I think I would do it. I think if you were to drop the HS French Vanilla down to .25% or .5% it wouldn't weigh the mix down so much and let those strawberries shine a bit more.
